amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds to expand plutonium pit production capacity at the PF-4 facility at Los Alamos National Laboratory.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to expand plutonium pit production capacity at the PF-4 facility at Los Alamos National Laboratory.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 293 (Roll no. 254).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 126 - 293 (Roll no. 254).

Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
